name: lords-of-cyberspace
description: A gateway into a Lords of Cyberspace server

scripts.dev: pip3 install --user -r req.txt && webpack --config webpack.dev.config.js && cd cyber && CC=clang make && cd .. && python3 server.py
scripts.start: webpack --config webpack.config.js -p && cd cyber && CC=clang make && cd .. && python3 server.py
